E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/16/1973
Subject: Progress of Bill Sharp
Dear Sir,
Bill Sharp has an AVG of .277 at AA Asheville Orioles!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Friday, 5/17/1973
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Don O'Riley



Date: Sunday, 5/19/1973
Subject: Progress of Bruce Ellingsen
Dear Sir,
Bruce Ellingsen is doing pretty good at AA Asheville Orioles!
He has an ERA of 3.32, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
